{"id":941920325,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1682827506,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"241 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/941920325/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"First Completely Painted Row or Column","memory":"127.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int firstCompleteIndex(vector<int>& arr, vector<vector<int>>& mat) {\n        int n = mat.size();\n        int m = mat[0].size();\n        vector<int> row(n), col(m);\n        vector<int> my_row(n * m), my_col(n * m);\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {\n                mat[i][j]--;\n                my_row[mat[i][j]] = i;\n                my_col[mat[i][j]] = j;\n            }\n        }\n        for (int i = 0; i < arr.size(); i++) {\n            int x = arr[i]; --x;\n            row[my_row[x]]++;\n            col[my_col[x]]++;\n            if (row[my_row[x]] == m || col[my_col[x]] == n) return i;\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"first-completely-painted-row-or-column","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
